oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James Tinker's 1859 store account
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Store account for goods bought of John A. Wilds & Son of Jonesborough, Tennessee. The account demonstrates the barter economy by which Tinker exchanges pork, corn, and corn meal for fabric and store goods. See also A. Christine Tipton's book, "Civil War in the Mountains."
